fulltext:
730 Le Duc Tho Street, Ho Chi Minh City 
(08) 945 935 349 
luannguyenbkit@gmail.com 
LUAN NGUYEN
ABOUT ME 
-
I have about 3-year experience working with React JS and React Native especially Infinito Wallet 
product is one of my best product that I devoted a lot of time to build with my colleagues. It is used 
by more than 100k people and downloaded by more than 500k people also. 
-
Before that, joining many Ecommerce projects related to ReactJS and Next.js brings me a lot of 
interest to work and research more about ReactJS, React- Native and Javascript. 
-
I spend time learning so many Backend Technologies such as Nodejs, Laravel and I have some 
personal products related to this field also. 
EXPERIENCES 
Infinity Blockchain Labs 
SEP 2017 - NOW 
●
Project: Infinito Wallet (https://www.infinitowallet.io) 
○
Position: Leader & Senior React-Native Developer 
○
Technical: React-Native, Redux, Redux-saga, Redux-Persist, React-Navigation, 
React-Native-Navigation... 
○
Description: Infinito Wallet is my first project about Blockchains. It took me a lot of time to 
research React-Native and libraries related to Mobile. 
Scubism Vietnam 
APR 2016 - AUG 2017 
●
Project: Repark-toppi (https://www.repark-toppi.jp/) 
○
Position: Frontend Developer 
○
Technical: NextJS, ReactJS, Redux, Redux Thunk, React Router... 
○
Descriptions: Repark toppi is a product of IOT which is about car park management. I 
worked for admin. I focus on NextJS and have a lot of experience of Server-Rendering. 
●
Project: EC-ORANGE Ecommerce platform (https://ec-orange.jp/) 
○
Position: Full Stack Developer 
○
Technical: ReactJS, Redux, Redux Thunk, React Router… and Laravel for backend 
○
Descriptions: This is my first ReactJS project and also a big project of Scubism. I was 
familiar with ES6, definitions of Javascript and I started working ReactJS from this time. 
Vien Dong College 
AUG 2015 - MAR 2016 
●
Project: VGB - vgb.com.vn 
○
Position: WEB Developer 
○
Technical: NodeJS, Laravel. 
○
Descriptions: VGB is a project about Gold Market. 
YouNet 
AUG 2014 - FEB 2015 
●
Project: Processing Big Data with ZeroMQ 
○
Position: Developer 
○
Technical: PHP, ZeroMQ, PHP Memcache 
○
Descriptions: My responsibilities is crawling and dealing big data with ZeroMQ.

○
Position: React-Native Developer

○
Descriptions: This is my personal project. I have collected new technologies of React JS, 
React- Native as well as Redux, Redux-saga, React-Navigation.
